task.title: Task
task.closeAndStart: Close task and start a new one
task.delete: Delete Task (Shift + Click to skip confirmation)
task.shareWithOrganizationDescription: Only members of your organization can access
task.sharePubliclyDescription: Anyone with the link can access
task.connectToCloudDescription: Sign in to Sentinel Code Cloud to share tasks
task.openInCloud: Open task in Sentinel Code Cloud
task.openInCloudIntro: Keep monitoring or interacting with Sentinel from anywhere. Scan, click or copy to open.

enqueueMessage: Add message to queue (will be sent after current task completes)
about: Sentinel is a whole AI dev team in your editor
onboarding: What would you like to do?

customizableModes.title: Customizable modes that don't swerve
customizableModes.description: Specialized personas that stay on-task and deliver.

modelAgnostic.title: Bring your own model, no markup or lock-in
modelAgnostic.description: Use your own provider key or even run local inference — Sentinel doesn't charge for it

modeSelector.title: Modes
modeSelector.description: Specialized personas that tailor Sentinel's behavior.

enhancePromptDescription: The 'Enhance Prompt' button helps improve your prompt by providing additional context, clarification, or rephrasing. Try typing a prompt in here and clicking the button again to see how it works.
dragFiles: hold shift to drag in files
dragFilesImages: hold shift to drag in files/images

errorMessage.400: The provider couldn't process the request as made. Stop the task and try a different approach.
errorMessage.401: Couldn't authenticate with provider. Please check your API key configuration.
errorMessage.402: You seem to have run out of funds/credits in your account. Go to your provider and add more to continue.
errorMessage.403: Unauthorized. Your API key is valid, but the provider refused to complete this request.
errorMessage.429: Too many requests. You're being rate-limited by the provider. Please wait a bit before your next API call.
errorMessage.500: Provider server error. Something is wrong on the provider side, there's nothing wrong with your request.
errorMessage.connection: Connection error. Make sure you have a working internet connection.
errorMessage.unknown: Unknown API error. Please contact Sentinel Code support.
errorMessage.claudeCodeNotAuthenticated: You need to sign in to use Claude Code. Go to Settings and click "Sign in to Claude Code" to authenticate.

checkpoint.initializingWarning: Still initializing checkpoint... If this takes too long, you can disable checkpoints in <settingsLink>settings</settingsLink> and restart your task.

menu.restoreFilesDescription: Restores your project's files back to a snapshot taken at this point.
menu.restoreFilesAndTaskDescription: Restores your project's files back to a snapshot taken at this point and deletes all messages after this point.

truncation.title: Context Truncated
truncation.description: Older messages were removed from the conversation to stay within the context window limit. This is a fast but less context-preserving approach compared to condensation.

instructions.wantsToFetch: Sentinel wants to fetch detailed instructions to assist with the current task

skill.wantsToLoad: Roo wants to load a skill

fileOperations.wantsToRead: Sentinel wants to read this file
fileOperations.wantsToReadMultiple: Sentinel wants to read multiple files
fileOperations.wantsToReadAndXMore: Sentinel wants to read this file and {{count}} more
fileOperations.wantsToReadOutsideWorkspace: Sentinel wants to read this file outside of the workspace
fileOperations.wantsToEdit: Sentinel wants to edit this file
fileOperations.wantsToEditOutsideWorkspace: Sentinel wants to edit this file outside of the workspace
fileOperations.wantsToEditProtected: Sentinel wants to edit a protected configuration file
fileOperations.wantsToApplyBatchChanges: Sentinel wants to apply changes to multiple files
fileOperations.wantsToGenerateImage: Sentinel wants to generate an image
fileOperations.wantsToGenerateImageOutsideWorkspace: Sentinel wants to generate an image outside of the workspace
fileOperations.wantsToGenerateImageProtected: Sentinel wants to generate an image in a protected location
fileOperations.wantsToCreate: Sentinel wants to create a new file
fileOperations.wantsToInsert: Sentinel wants to insert content into this file
fileOperations.wantsToInsertWithLineNumber: Sentinel wants to insert content into this file at line {{lineNumber}}
fileOperations.wantsToInsertAtEnd: Sentinel wants to append content to the end of this file

directoryOperations.wantsToViewTopLevel: Sentinel wants to view the top level files in this directory
directoryOperations.didViewTopLevel: Sentinel viewed the top level files in this directory
directoryOperations.wantsToViewTopLevelOutsideWorkspace: Sentinel wants to view the top level files in this directory (outside workspace)
directoryOperations.didViewTopLevelOutsideWorkspace: Sentinel viewed the top level files in this directory (outside workspace)
directoryOperations.wantsToViewRecursive: Sentinel wants to recursively view all files in this directory
directoryOperations.didViewRecursive: Sentinel recursively viewed all files in this directory
directoryOperations.wantsToViewRecursiveOutsideWorkspace: Sentinel wants to recursively view all files in this directory (outside workspace)
directoryOperations.didViewRecursiveOutsideWorkspace: Sentinel recursively viewed all files in this directory (outside workspace)
directoryOperations.wantsToSearch: Sentinel wants to search this directory for {{regex}}
directoryOperations.wantsToSearchOutsideWorkspace: Sentinel wants to search this directory (outside workspace) for {{regex}}
directoryOperations.didSearchOutsideWorkspace: Sentinel searched this directory (outside workspace) for {{regex}}

codebaseSearch.wantsToSearch: Sentinel wants to search the codebase for {{query}}
codebaseSearch.wantsToSearchWithPath: Sentinel wants to search the codebase for {{query}} in {{path}}

mcp.wantsToUseTool: Sentinel wants to use a tool on the {{serverName}} MCP server
mcp.wantsToAccessResource: Sentinel wants to access a resource on the {{serverName}} MCP server

modes.wantsToSwitch: Sentinel wants to switch to {{mode}} mode
modes.wantsToSwitchWithReason: Sentinel wants to switch to {{mode}} mode because: {{reason}}

subtasks.wantsToCreate: Sentinel wants to create a new subtask in {{mode}} mode
subtasks.wantsToFinish: Sentinel wants to mark this as completed
subtasks.defaultResult: Please continue to the next task.
subtasks.completionInstructions: You can review the results and suggest any corrections or next steps. If everything looks good, confirm to return the result to the parent task.

modelResponseErrors.noToolsUsed: The model failed to use any tools in its response. This typically happens when the model provides only text/reasoning without calling the required tools to complete the task.
modelResponseErrors.noToolsUsedDetails: The model provided text/reasoning but did not call any of the required tools. This usually indicates the model misunderstood the task or is having difficulty determining which tool to use. The model has been automatically prompted to retry with proper tool usage.
modelResponseErrors.noAssistantMessages: The model did not provide any response content. This may indicate an issue with the API or the model's output.
modelResponseErrors.noAssistantMessagesDetails: The language model returned an empty response without any text or tool calls. This can happen due to API issues, rate limiting, or model-specific problems. The model has been automatically prompted to retry.

errorDetails.title: Error Details
errorDetails.proxyProvider: You seem to be using a proxy-based provider. Make sure to check its logs and to ensure it's not rewriting Sentinel's requests.

powershell.issues: It seems like you're having Windows PowerShell issues, please see this

autoApprove.title: Auto-approve
autoApprove.description: Run these actions without asking for permission. Only enable for actions you fully trust.
autoApprove.selectOptionsFirst: Select at least one option below to enable auto-approval

announcement.title: Sentinel Code {{version}} Released
announcement.support: Please support Sentinel Code by starring us on <githubLink>GitHub</githubLink>.

stealthModel.feature: <bold>Limited-time FREE stealth model</bold> - Code Supernova: Now upgraded with a <bold>1M token context window</bold>! A versatile agentic coding model that supports image inputs, accessible through Sentinel Code Cloud.
stealthModel.note: (Note: prompts and completions are logged by the model creator and used to improve the model)
stealthModel.selectModel: Select roo/code-supernova from the Sentinel Code Cloud provider in Settings to get started.

release.heading: What's New:
release.smartCodeFolding: Smart Code Folding: Context condensation now preserves a lightweight map of your files: function signatures, class declarations, and type definitions. This provides better continuity after condensing and smarter edits when referencing previous work.

cloudAgents.heading: New in the Cloud:
cloudAgents.specialized: Introducing <bold>Explainer</bold>, <bold>Planner</bold>, and <bold>Coder</bold> - three specialized cloud agents to enhance your workflows.
cloudAgents.description: The agents work together in the cloud and can be triggered from the web or through Slack.

followUpSuggest.copyToInput: Copy to input (same as shift + click)

browser.rooWantsToUse: Sentinel wants to use the browser

systemPromptWarning: WARNING: Custom system prompt override active. This can severely break functionality and cause unpredictable behavior.
profileViolationWarning: The current profile isn't compatible with your organization's settings

shellIntegration.title: Command Execution Warning
shellIntegration.description: Your command is being executed without VSCode terminal shell integration. To suppress this warning you can disable shell integration in the Terminal section of the Sentinel Code settings or troubleshoot VSCode terminal integration using the link below.
shellIntegration.troubleshooting: Click here for shell integration documentation.

autoApprovedRequestLimitReached.title: Auto-Approved Request Limit Reached
autoApprovedRequestLimitReached.description: Sentinel has reached the auto-approved limit of {{count}} API request(s). Would you like to reset the count and proceed with the task?

autoApprovedCostLimitReached.title: Auto-Approved Cost Limit Reached
autoApprovedCostLimitReached.description: Sentinel has reached the auto-approved cost limit of ${{count}}. Would you like to reset the cost and proceed with the task?

versionIndicator.ariaLabel: Version {{version}} - Click to view release notes

slashCommands.title: Slash Commands
slashCommands.description: Use built-in slash commands or create custom ones for quick access to frequently used prompts and workflows. <DocsLink>Docs</DocsLink>

deleteDialog.title: Delete Command
deleteDialog.description: Are you sure you want to delete the command "{{name}}"? This action cannot be undone.

slashCommand.wantsToRun: Sentinel wants to run a slash command

tooManyTools.title: Too many tools enabled
tooManyTools.messageTemplate: You have {{tools}} enabled via {{servers}}. Such a high number can confuse the model and lead to errors. Try to keep it below {{threshold}}.
